channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- jwt-simple node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- jwt-simple node module

item.title: CVE-2016-10555|2024-09-16T16:38:09.923Z -- hackerone -- jwt-simple%20node%20module
item.description: Since "algorithm" isn't enforced in jwt.decode()in jwt-simple 0.3.0 and earlier, a malicious user could choose what algorithm is sent sent to the server. If the server is expecting RSA but is sent HMAC-SHA with RSA's public key, the server will think the public key is actually an HMAC private key. This could be used to forge any data an attacker wants.
